version_description:
Responding to some valuable customer feedback:

The month side marker is back! To turn it on click the settings cog on the bottom toolbar and press the Month Marker switch.

Reinstated the 4 weeks on 4 weeks off Rota preset.

Some larger updates are in the pipeline, thank you for the support.

Added localizations for US, Canada and Australia.

Some minor bug fixes.

A larger update with some brand new functionality is being worked on.

Use AirDrop to instantly share your rotas and shift schedules with nearby iOS devices.

Ensure AirDrop is setup and tap the far left action button on the bottom toolbar.

Fixed issues with the calendar event/appointment details table.

The event details table at the bottom where events can be viewed and selected would occasionally glitch, resulting in a blank table or weird behaviour.

This has now been fixed, thank you to some valuable help from customers who were experiencing the issue.

Other minor bugs have also been fixed and more features are in the pipeline.

If you would like to make suggestions or report issues please connect via my Facebook page which I keep updated with news and what I am currently working on:

www.facebook.com/jrwstudio

Thank you for using Rota Calendar this update brings iOS 11 and iPhone X support.

As always, all feedback and suggestions are noted down and work has started on some new features, enhancements and minor tweaks. Some highlights include: optional dividers between months, exporting shifts as events to other calendars and improvements to the shift marker editing workflow.

Please Note: Compatibility with iOS 8 has been dropped and from this update onwards the minimum supported version is iOS 9.
Thank you for using Rota Calendar this update is intended to push through some App Store screen shot changes.
